name: snipe-it
description: Snipe-IT is a self-hosted IT asset management platform for tracking hardware, software, and accessories. It supports barcodes, audit logs, and role-based access via a web UI.

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Manages hardware, software licenses, and accessories with detailed records

features.title: Check
features.description: Tracks asset assignments to users with history and due dates

features.title: Barcode Scanning
features.description: Generates and scans barcodes for quick asset identification

features.title: Maintenance Tracking
features.description: Schedules and logs maintenance activities for equipment

features.title: Depreciation
features.description: Calculates asset depreciation using multiple accounting methods

features.title: Audit Logs
features.description: Records all changes and actions for compliance and accountability

features.title: Custom Fields
features.description: Adds organization-specific fields to asset records

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Sends alerts for check-outs, due dates, and low inventory
